page.title: 08LARKHOLME SCHOOL,FLEETWOOD
page.content: The school was built in 1973 for{950 pupils, taking children from eleven to sixteen. The number of pupils at the present time is{647.}There are{27 classes with{39}teachers. The approximate pupil:teacher ratio is {25:1. There is a school uniform,the basic colours are grey and blue.However,the school does not feel it can insist on the strict enforcement of uniform.It prefers to stress the importance of an acceptable "school dress". "Cafeteria_type" school dinners are provided, or packed lunches for those who wish to bring them. There is a major problem of{falling {rolls}and if this grows any more serious, it could result in{possible {closure.}Alternatively,it could be {amalgamated}with Fleetwood Hesketh School.
